Fetch Single Team Details API
Acceptance Criteria

Fetch Team Details [GET] /api/teams/

Fetch Team Details Endpoint

Fetch Single Team Details API
Acceptance Criteria

Fetch Team Details [GET] /api/teams/

Fetch Team Details Endpoint

Given: A request with a valid team ID. When: The user fetches team details. Then: The system should return the team details with a 200 OK status code.
Team Not Found

Given: A request with an invalid team ID. When: The user fetches team details. Then: The system should return a 404 Not Found status with an appropriate error message.
Unauthorized Access

Given: A request without a valid token. When: The user tries to access the endpoint. Then: The system should return a 401 Unauthorized status.
